toolUseResult.originalFile:
# MDPreview A lightweight, fast Markdown preview app for macOS. Built for developers who need to quickly preview `plan.md`, `README.md`, and other Markdown files from the terminal. [日本語](README.ja.md) | [한국어](README.ko.md) | [Español](README.es.md) | [Français](README.fr.md) | [Deutsch](README.de.md) | [Português](README.pt-BR.md) ![macOS](https://img.shields.io/badge/macOS-13.0%2B-blue) ![Swift](https://img.shields.io/badge/Swift-5.9%2B-orange) ![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-green) [![CI](https://github.com/kazu-42/mdpreview/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/kazu-42/mdpreview/actions/workflows/ci.yml)

## Features - **Fast startup** - Native macOS app, opens instantly - **Full GFM support** - Tables, task lists, strikethrough, autolinks - **Syntax highlighting** - 40+ programming languages via [highlight.js](https://highlightjs.org/) - **Live reload** - Automatically refreshes when the file changes on disk - **Tabs** - Open multiple files as tabs, switch with Cmd+Shift+] / [ - **File tree sidebar** - Open a directory to browse and preview Markdown files - **Dark/Light mode** - Follows macOS system appearance - **CLI-friendly** - `mdpreview file.md` launches instantly, returns to terminal - **Zero dependencies** - No external Swift packages - **Lightweight** - ~200KB binary + ~160KB bundled JS/CSS ## Installation ### Homebrew ```bash brew install --cask kazu-42/tap/mdpreview ``` ### Download Download the latest `.dmg` or `.zip` from the [Releases](https://github.com/kazu-42/mdpreview/releases) page. After installing, open the app and go to **MDPreview > Install Command Line Tool...** to set up the `mdpreview` command. ### Build from Source ```bash git clone https://github.com/kazu-42/mdpreview.git cd mdpreview # Build and create .app bundle make all # Install to /Applications make install # Install CLI (requires sudo) sudo make cli ``` ## Usage ### From the Terminal ```bash # Open a Markdown file mdpreview README.md # Open multiple files as tabs mdpreview file1.md file2.md # Open a directory with file tree sidebar mdpreview . mdpreview ~/projects/my-app/ # Launch the app without arguments mdpreview ``` ### From Finder - **Drag and drop** a `.md` file onto the MDPreview window or Dock icon - **Right-click** a `.md` file > Open With > MDPreview - Use **Cmd+O** to open a file or directory from the menu ### Keyboard Shortcuts | Shortcut | Action | |----------|--------| | `Cmd+O` | Open file / directory | | `Cmd+W` | Close tab / window | | `Cmd+Shift+]` | Next tab | | `Cmd+Shift+[` | Previous tab | | `Ctrl+Tab` | Next tab | | `Cmd+Q` | Quit | ## Screenshots ### Light Mode

### Dark Mode

## How It Works MDPreview uses a minimal SwiftUI shell with a `WKWebView` for rendering. The rendering pipeline is: ``` Markdown file on disk → Swift reads file content → Passes to WKWebView → marked.js converts to HTML (GFM) → highlight.js colorizes code blocks → CSS styles for dark/light mode ``` File changes are detected using GCD's `DispatchSource` file system monitoring, with debouncing to handle rapid saves. ## Architecture ``` Sources/ ├── MDPreviewCore/ # Core library │ ├── MDPreviewApp.swift # SwiftUI App scene + commands │ ├── AppDelegate.swift # Finder/CLI integration │ ├── Workspace.swift # Tab management + state │ ├── MainView.swift # Layout: sidebar + tabs + preview │ ├── FileTree.swift # Directory tree model + view │ ├── MarkdownWebView.swift # WKWebView wrapper │ ├── FileWatcher.swift # DispatchSource file monitor │ ├── CLIInstaller.swift # Command line tool installer │ └── Resources/ │ ├── template.html # HTML rendering shell │ ├── marked.min.js # Markdown parser (GFM) │ ├── highlight.min.js # Syntax highlighting │ └── *.css # GitHub-style themes └── MDPreview/ └── main.swift # Entry point ``` ## Requirements - macOS 13.0 (Ventura) or later - Apple Silicon or Intel Mac ### Build Requirements - Xcode 15.0+ or Swift 5.9+ toolchain - No additional dependencies required ## Contributing Contributions are welcome! See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) for guidelines. Please note that this project follows a [Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md). ## Security To report a security vulnerability, please see our [Security Policy](SECURITY.md). ## Acknowledgments - [marked.js](https://github.com/markedjs/marked) - Markdown parser - [highlight.js](https://github.com/highlightjs/highlight.js) - Syntax highlighting - [QLMarkdown](https://github.com/sbarex/QLMarkdown) - UI/UX inspiration ## License [MIT License](LICENSE) - see [LICENSE](LICENSE) for details.

lines: A lightweight, fast Markdown preview app for macOS. Built for developers who need to quickly preview `plan.md`, `README.md`, and other Markdown files from the terminal.

input.command:
python3 << 'EOF'
import re

switchers = {
    "README.md": "[日本語](README.ja.md) | [한국어](README.ko.md) | [Español](README.es.md) | [Français](README.fr.md) | [Deutsch](README.de.md) | [Português](README.pt-BR.md) | [简体中文](README.zh-CN.md)",
    "README.ja.md": "[English](README.md) | [한국어](README.ko.md) | [Español](README.es.md) | [Français](README.fr.md) | [Deutsch](README.de.md) | [Português](README.pt-BR.md) | [简体中文](README.zh-CN.md)",
    "README.ko.md": "[English](README.md) | [日本語](README.ja.md) | [Español](README.es.md) | [Français](README.fr.md) | [Deutsch](README.de.md) | [Português](README.pt-BR.md) | [简体中文](README.zh-CN.md)",
    "README.es.md": "[English](README.md) | [日本語](README.ja.md) | [한국어](README.ko.md) | [Français](README.fr.md) | [Deutsch](README.de.md) | [Português](README.pt-BR.md) | [简体中文](README.zh-CN.md)",
    "README.fr.md": "[English](README.md) | [日本語](README.ja.md) | [한국어](README.ko.md) | [Español](README.es.md) | [Deutsch](README.de.md) | [Português](README.pt-BR.md) | [简体中文](README.zh-CN.md)",
    "README.de.md": "[English](README.md) | [日本語](README.ja.md) | [한국어](README.ko.md) | [Español](README.es.md) | [Français](README.fr.md) | [Português](README.pt-BR.md) | [简体中文](README.zh-CN.md)",
    "README.pt-BR.md": "[English](README.md) | [日本語](README.ja.md) | [한국어](README.ko.md) | [Español](README.es.md) | [Français](README.fr.md) | [Deutsch](README.de.md) | [简体中文](README.zh-CN.md)",
    "README.zh-CN.md": "[English](README.md) | [日本語](README.ja.md) | [한국어](README.ko.md) | [Español](README.es.md) | [Français](README.fr.md) | [Deutsch](README.de.md) | [Português](README.pt-BR.md)",
}

for filename, switcher in switchers.items():
    with open(filename, 'r') as f:
        lines = f.readlines()
    
    # Find and replace the language switcher line (line 5)
    for i, line in enumerate(lines):
        if 'README.ja.md' in line or 'README.ko.md' in line:
            lines[i] = switcher + '\n'
            break
    
    with open(filename, 'w') as f:
        f.writelines(lines)
    print(f"Fixed {filename}")
EOF

content.thinking: Now let me commit all these changes with a good commit message.

input.command:
git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
feat: Add tabs, file tree sidebar, and CLI installer

Features:
- Tabs support with Cmd+Shift+]/[ navigation
- File tree sidebar for directory browsing
- Multi-file CLI: mdpreview file1.md file2.md
- Directory CLI: mdpreview . opens with file tree
- In-app CLI installer via MDPreview > Install Command Line Tool...

Improvements:
- Updated README with 8 language translations (EN/JA/KO/ES/FR/DE/PT-BR/ZH-CN)
- Added CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md, SECURITY.md
- Updated CONTRIBUTING.md and CHANGELOG.md
- Created Homebrew tap at kazu-42/homebrew-tap

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"

content.thinking: DMG created. Now let me create a GitHub release.

input.command:
SHA256=$(shasum -a 256 build/MDPreview.dmg | cut -d' ' -f1)
echo "SHA256: $SHA256"
gh release create v1.1.0 ./build/MDPreview.dmg --title "v1.1.0 - Tabs & File Tree" --notes "$(cat <<'EOF'
## What's New

### Features
- **Tabs support**: Open multiple files as tabs with `Cmd+Shift+]/[` navigation
- **File tree sidebar**: Open a directory to browse and preview Markdown files
- **Directory CLI**: `mdpreview .` or `mdpreview ~/projects/` opens with file tree
- **Multi-file CLI**: `mdpreview file1.md file2.md` opens multiple tabs
- **CLI installer**: Menu item to install `mdpreview` command from the app

### Improvements
- 8 language translations (EN/JA/KO/ES/FR/DE/PT-BR/ZH-CN)
- Updated documentation

## Installation

### Homebrew
```bash
brew install --cask kazu-42/tap/mdpreview
```

### Download
Download `MDPreview.dmg` below, open it, and drag MDPreview to Applications.

After installing, open the app and go to **MDPreview > Install Command Line Tool...** to set up the `mdpreview` command.

## What's Changed
- feat: Add tabs support with keyboard navigation
- feat: Add file tree sidebar for directory browsing  
- feat: Add CLI installer accessible from app menu
- docs: Add translations in 8 languages
- docs: Add CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md, SECURITY.md

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kazu-42/mdpreview/compare/v1.0.0...v1.1.0
EOF
)" 2>&1

content.thinking:
The user is asking about the "unverified developer" warning that appears when installing apps via Homebrew that aren't signed with an Apple developer certificate. They want to know how to get an Apple developer certificate.

Let me explain the process for getting an Apple Developer certificate.

content.text:
Apple Developer Program に登録が必要。

## Apple Developer証明書の取得

### 1. Apple Developer Program に登録
- **URL**: https://developer.apple.com/programs/
- **費用**: $99/年 (約15,000円)
- **必要なもの**: Apple ID、クレジットカード

### 2. 登録後の手順
```bash
# Xcode で Apple ID にサインイン
# Xcode > Preferences > Accounts > Add Apple ID

# 証明書を作成
# Developer ID Application Certificate
```

### 3. コード署名
```bash
# 署名付きビルド
codesign --sign "Developer ID Application: Your Name (TEAM_ID)" \
         --deep --force --verify --verbose \
         build/MDPreview.app

# 公証 (Notarization) - Apple がマルウェア検査
xcrun notarytool submit build/MDPreview.dmg \
    --apple-id "your@email.com" \
    --team-id "TEAM_ID" \
    --password "app-specific-password" \
    --wait

# ステープル (オフライン検証用)
xcrun stapler staple build/MDPreview.dmg
```

### コスト vs ベネフィット

| オプション | コスト | ユーザー体験 |
|-----------|--------|-------------|
| 無署名 (現在) | $0 | 右クリック > 開く で回避可能 |
| Apple Developer | $99/年 | 警告なしで開ける |

### 無署名の回避策（ユーザー側）
```bash
# 初回のみ
xattr -cr /Applications/MDPreview.app

# または右クリック > 開く > 開く
```

有料のDeveloper Program登録する？それともREADMEに回避策を追加する？

content.thinking: The user has an "Apple Development" certificate, but for distributing apps outside the App Store, they need a "Developer ID Application" certificate. Let me check if they have one or explain how to get one.

content.text:
`Apple Development` 証明書があるが、配布用には `Developer ID Application` が必要。

## Developer ID Application 証明書の作成

### 方法1: Xcode から
```
Xcode > Preferences > Accounts
> Apple ID 選択 > Manage Certificates
> + > Developer ID Application
```

### 方法2: Web から
1. https://developer.apple.com/account/resources/certificates/list
2. **Certificates** > **+** (Create a Certificate)
3. **Developer ID Application** を選択
4. CSR をアップロード（Keychain Access で作成）

---

CSR作成方法:
```bash
# Keychain Access > Certificate Assistant > Request a Certificate From a Certificate Authority
# または:
openssl req -new -newkey rsa:2048 -nodes \
  -keyout developerID.key \
  -out developerID.csr \
  -subj "/emailAddress=wolfpack_falcon.kazu@icloud.com/CN=Your Name/C=JP"
```

証明書作成後、ダウンロードしてダブルクリックで Keychain に追加。

完了したら教えて。署名と公証のスクリプトを用意する。

message.content: mcp bridgeからできたりしない？

content.thinking:
The user is asking if they can create the Developer ID Application certificate from the MCP bridge or through some automated way. Let me check what MCP tools might be available for Apple Developer related tasks.

Looking at the available tools, I don't see any MCP tools specifically for Apple Developer certificate management. The xcodebuild MCP tools are for building and testing, not for managing developer certificates.

The certificate creation requires:
1. Access to Apple Developer website (developer.apple.com)
2. Or Xcode's certificate management

There's no MCP bridge or API that I know of that can directly create Apple Developer certificates. This is a security-sensitive operation that Apple requires to be done through their official channels.

Let me explain this to the user.

content.text:
残念ながら、Apple Developer証明書の作成はMCP/CLIから直接できない。

**理由:**
- Apple セキュリティポリシーで Web/Xcode 経由のみ
- 2FA必須
- CSR作成 → Web upload → ダウンロード の手動フロー

---

**ただし、一度証明書を作れば自動化できる:**

```bash
# Makefile に追加可能
sign:
	codesign --sign "Developer ID Application: Your Name (TEAM_ID)" \
	         --deep --force --timestamp \
	         build/MDPreview.app

notarize:
	xcrun notarytool submit build/MDPreview.dmg \
	    --apple-id "wolfpack_falcon.kazu@icloud.com" \
	    --team-id "YOUR_TEAM_ID" \
	    --password "@keychain:AC_PASSWORD" \
	    --wait
	xcrun stapler staple build/MDPreview.dmg
```

---

**今の選択肢:**

1. **今すぐ Web で作成** → 5分程度
   - https://developer.apple.com/account/resources/certificates/list
   
2. **Xcode で作成** → Xcode開いて2分

3. **後回し** → ユーザーに `xattr -cr` で回避してもらう

やる？

message.content: xcodeでやる

content.thinking: The user wants to create the Developer ID Application certificate via Xcode. I should guide them through the steps, but since this is a GUI operation, I can only provide instructions. Let me give them clear step-by-step instructions.

content.text:
Xcode で `Developer ID Application` 証明書を作成:

## 手順

1. **Xcode を開く**

2. **Settings を開く**
   - `Xcode` → `Settings...` (または `Cmd + ,`)

3. **Accounts タブ**
   - 左側のアカウント一覧から Apple ID を選択
   - 右側の **Manage Certificates...** をクリック

4. **証明書を作成**
   - 左下の **+** をクリック
   - **Developer ID Application** を選択
   - 自動で作成・Keychain に追加される

5. **完了確認**
   - Keychain Access で確認:
   ```
   login → My Certificates → Developer ID Application: ...
   ```

---

完了したら教えて。以下確認する:
```bash
security find-identity -v -p codesigning
```

  - `docs/CHANGELOG.md`

Actually, for OSS best practices, the standard files should stay in root:
- README.md - root
- LICENSE - root
- CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md - root (or .github/)
- CONTRIBUTING.md - root (or .github/)
- SECURITY.md - root
- CHANGELOG.md - root

Let me check what's typical for Swift projects and propose a clean structure.

Let me just clean up and not over-engineer.

file.content:
# MDPreview

A lightweight, fast Markdown preview app for macOS. Built for developers who need to quickly preview `plan.md`, `README.md`, and other Markdown files from the terminal.

[日本語](README.ja.md) | [한국어](README.ko.md) | [Español](README.es.md) | [Français](README.fr.md) | [Deutsch](README.de.md) | [Português](README.pt-BR.md) | [简体中文](README.zh-CN.md)

![macOS](https://img.shields.io/badge/macOS-13.0%2B-blue)
![Swift](https://img.shields.io/badge/Swift-5.9%2B-orange)
![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-green)
[![CI](https://github.com/kazu-42/mdpreview/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/kazu-42/mdpreview/actions/workflows/ci.yml)

input.command:
python3 << 'EOF'
import os

switchers = {
    "docs/i18n/README.ja.md": "[English](../../README.md) | [한국어](README.ko.md) | [Español](README.es.md) | [Français](README.fr.md) | [Deutsch](README.de.md) | [Português](README.pt-BR.md) | [简体中文](README.zh-CN.md)",
    "docs/i18n/README.ko.md": "[English](../../README.md) | [日本語](README.ja.md) | [Español](README.es.md) | [Français](README.fr.md) | [Deutsch](README.de.md) | [Português](README.pt-BR.md) | [简体中文](README.zh-CN.md)",
    "docs/i18n/README.es.md": "[English](../../README.md) | [日本語](README.ja.md) | [한국어](README.ko.md) | [Français](README.fr.md) | [Deutsch](README.de.md) | [Português](README.pt-BR.md) | [简体中文](README.zh-CN.md)",
    "docs/i18n/README.fr.md": "[English](../../README.md) | [日本語](README.ja.md) | [한국어](README.ko.md) | [Español](README.es.md) | [Deutsch](README.de.md) | [Português](README.pt-BR.md) | [简体中文](README.zh-CN.md)",
    "docs/i18n/README.de.md": "[English](../../README.md) | [日本語](README.ja.md) | [한국어](README.ko.md) | [Español](README.es.md) | [Français](README.fr.md) | [Português](README.pt-BR.md) | [简体中文](README.zh-CN.md)",
    "docs/i18n/README.pt-BR.md": "[English](../../README.md) | [日本語](README.ja.md) | [한국어](README.ko.md) | [Español](README.es.md) | [Français](README.fr.md) | [Deutsch](README.de.md) | [简体中文](README.zh-CN.md)",
    "docs/i18n/README.zh-CN.md": "[English](../../README.md) | [日本語](README.ja.md) | [한국어](README.ko.md) | [Español](README.es.md) | [Français](README.fr.md) | [Deutsch](README.de.md) | [Português](README.pt-BR.md)",
}

for filename, switcher in switchers.items():
    with open(filename, 'r') as f:
        lines = f.readlines()
    
    for i, line in enumerate(lines):
        if 'README.ja.md' in line or 'README.ko.md' in line or 'README.md)' in line:
            lines[i] = switcher + '\n'
            break
    
    with open(filename, 'w') as f:
        f.writelines(lines)
    print(f"Updated {filename}")
EOF

input.command:
# Update main README
sed -i '' 's|\[日本語\](README.ja.md)|[日本語](docs/i18n/README.ja.md)|g' README.md
sed -i '' 's|\[한국어\](README.ko.md)|[한국어](docs/i18n/README.ko.md)|g' README.md
sed -i '' 's|\[Español\](README.es.md)|[Español](docs/i18n/README.es.md)|g' README.md
sed -i '' 's|\[Français\](README.fr.md)|[Français](docs/i18n/README.fr.md)|g' README.md
sed -i '' 's|\[Deutsch\](README.de.md)|[Deutsch](docs/i18n/README.de.md)|g' README.md
sed -i '' 's|\[Português\](README.pt-BR.md)|[Português](docs/i18n/README.pt-BR.md)|g' README.md
sed -i '' 's|\[简体中文\](README.zh-CN.md)|[简体中文](docs/i18n/README.zh-CN.md)|g' README.md

# Update translation READMEs
for f in docs/i18n/README.*.md; do
  sed -i '' 's|\[English\](README.md)|[English](../../README.md)|g' "$f"
  sed -i '' 's|\[日本語\](README.ja.md)|[日本語](README.ja.md)|g' "$f"
  sed -i '' 's|\[한국어\](README.ko.md)|[한국어](README.ko.md)|g' "$f"
  sed -i '' 's|\[Español\](README.es.md)|[Español](README.es.md)|g' "$f"
  sed -i '' 's|\[Français\](README.fr.md)|[Français](README.fr.md)|g' "$f"
  sed -i '' 's|\[Deutsch\](README.de.md)|[Deutsch](README.de.md)|g' "$f"
  sed -i '' 's|\[Português\](README.pt-BR.md)|[Português](README.pt-BR.md)|g' "$f"
  sed -i '' 's|\[简体中文\](README.zh-CN.md)|[简体中文](README.zh-CN.md)|g' "$f"
done

echo "Done"
head -6 README.md
echo "---"
head -6 docs/i18n/README.ja.md

# MDPreview

A lightweight, fast Markdown preview app for macOS. Built for developers who need to quickly preview `plan.md`, `README.md`, and other Markdown files from the terminal.

[日本語](docs/i18n/README.ja.md) | [한국어](docs/i18n/README.ko.md) | [Español](docs/i18n/README.es.md) | [Français](docs/i18n/README.fr.md) | [Deutsch](docs/i18n/README.de.md) | [Português](docs/i18n/README.pt-BR.md) | [简体中文](docs/i18n/README.zh-CN.md)

---

macOS向けの軽量・高速なMarkdownプレビューアプリ。ターミナルから`plan.md`、`README.md`などのMarkdownファイルを素早くプレビューしたい開発者のために作られました。

Project structure:

├── CONTRIBUTING.md
├── CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
├── SECURITY.md
├── LICENSE

└── Package.swift

EOF
)"
